title: Generic Combat Manoeuvre : Push (x)
text:
All models (excluding Monsters) can use the Push Combat Manoeuvre . For a Push , the target and/or attacker (attacker's choice) must be moved to an adjacent hex in a straight line (unless otherwise stipulated on your Hero's card).

Note: Attacks with a cost of (0AP) cannot be used to apply the Push Combat Manoeuvre . They can however be used for other Combat Manoeuvres .
